description:
Trail run in the morning, rewire the adventure van in the evening. Once you get used to having a great headlamp, you’ll find yourself reaching for it more than you ever thought you would. With 5 white lighting modes, the HM61R V.20 gives you a range from 5 lumens all the way to 1600. The 3 red light modes are great for early starts and answering the call of nature without waking your tent mates. Compatibility with a single rechargeable 18650 (included) or 2 CR123A batteries gives you options on the grid, or off.

  • 8 modes, 5 white: 5 lumens (300h), 50 lumens (35h), 150 lumens (12h), 600 lumens (3h), 1600 lumens turbo (2h – only useable for 3 minutes at a time due to heat buildup), 3 in red: 1 lumen (400h), 5 lumens (80h) and a 5 lumen strobe (160h)
  • Onboard charging port means you no longer need to remove the battery to charge your light (you can still remove the battery
  • Works with 1 rechargeable 18650 battery or 2 CR123A batteries, giving you convenient power options when travelling or stocking your emergency kit
  • Rugged aluminum body has type-III hard anodizing for an extra level of protection
  • Glass lens is toughened for durability and has anti-reflective coating
  • Magnetic tail cap lets you attach your light to metal surfaces for hands-free lighting
  • LED power indicator lets you know how your battery is doing, whether charging or discharging
  • 1-button operation is easy to use, with or without gloves
  • Intelligent circuitry remembers the last mode you were in
  • Lockout mode keeps your light from coming on when you don’t want it on
  • Can be easily adapted into a compact flashlight
  • Stainless steel clip gives you mounting options
  • Silicone strip on the back of the head strap helps keep it in place
  • Perforated, reflective headband wicks away sweat and helps keep you seen
  • Regulated output maintains constant brightness throughout battery life
  • In the box: HM61R v2.0, ARB-L18 3400mAh 18650 battery, magnetic charging cable, spare O-ring, user manual and warranty card
name: Fenix HM61R V2.0 Rechargeable Headlamp
